meanings.definition: a type of morning glory plant native to Mexico.
meanings.sent1: The ololiuquis plant has beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: In the garden, the ololiuquis adds a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The ololiuquis plant waved hello in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The ololiuquis plant's petals danced in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the vibrant hues of the ololiuquis plant.

meanings.definition: the seeds of the morning glory plant used in traditional Mesoamerican rituals.
meanings.sent1: The ololiuquis seeds are carefully collected for ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: During the ritual, the ololiuquis seeds are scattered symbolically.
meanings.sent3: The ololiuquis seeds played a tiny maraca tune.
meanings.sent4: The ololiuquis seeds held ancient secrets within them.
meanings.sent5: The ololiuquis seeds whispered stories of the past.
